title: More Beauty Brands Are Investing in Third-Party Certifications â€” Is it Worth it?
description: When Amy Liu launched skin-care and makeup brand Tower 28 in 2019, earning the Seal of Acceptance from the National Eczema Association was a non-negotiable. As someone with chronic eczema herself, Liu wanted her community to know they could fully trust the brand's formulas. "From the beginning, I ...Continue reading
author: Lindy Segal
